sentences.english: So that's a brief overview of the courses.

sentences.english: The author brief introduced the history of A Bing and her experience of playing the musical composition.

sentences.english: This paper described briefly the stoping work of remnant orebody in accumulative manganese deposits.

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the hook strength and the knot strength of aramid fiber are also introduced.

sentences.english: Finally, a general review on the applications and development of the technology both in China and in foreign cou…
sentences.chinese: 最后对其国内外发展和生产应用作了简介。

sentences.english: On the back of the printed sheet I also provided a brief introduction.
sentences.chinese: 在印就纸的背后也有我提供的简介。
